basics.name: Darío Nicolás Tamburello
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with a strong focus on JavaScript and TypeScript ecosystems, working across React, React Native, Node.js and Python-based systems. Product-oriented engineer with solid backend ownership, experience building and maintaining production systems, and a strong background in infrastructure that informs architectural and scalability decisions. Comfortable working in remote, English-speaking environments and collaborating closely with product and design teams.

work_experience.name: Code First Lab
tasks: Develop and maintain backend services and APIs, focusing on reliability, maintainability, and production stability.
Implement features based on defined requirements, debugging and resolving complex issues across the stack.
Develop user interfaces using React, React Native, TypeScript and Python depending on product needs.
Collaborate asynchronously with distributed teams while improving existing codebases.

work_experience.name: Plum
tasks: Developed and maintained large-scale e-commerce platforms using .NET and JavaScript-based frontends.
Improved UX/UI across desktop and mobile experiences.
Implemented backend and back-office features including third-party API integrations.
Worked daily in English within an agile Scrum environment maintaining high code quality standards.

work_experience.name: Eling S.A.
tasks: Managed infrastructure (Linux, Windows, databases and containers) combined with internal application development.
Built monitoring and operational tooling using Node.js and React.
